eu_initiatives:
Unitary Patent  
Unified Patent Court  
EUIPO (EU trademarks and Community design)
organisation_name: UNION OF EUROPEAN PRACTITIONERS IN INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY (UNION-IP)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Study problems relating to the protection of intellectual property and to the profession of the members of the UNION in the European field, to come to conclusions on these problems, and to convey these conclusions to the authorities and other interested paties.
relevant_communication: EU consultations in the field of IP
legal_status: a.i.s.b.l (International Non-Profit Association) under Belgian law
